trans-unit.source: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表可供任意數目的支援遮罩，例如控制項的遮罩剖析服務<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control contains a mask, composed of literal characters and formatting elements, that it tests all user input against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項包含常值字元所組成，而且格式項目，它會測試對所有使用者輸入的遮罩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of permanently associating a specific mask-parsing engine with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>, Windows Forms provides it as a separate service, represented by the MaskedTextProvider class, which defines the syntax of the masking language discussed in the documentation for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是永久關聯特定遮罩剖析引擎，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>，Windows Form 提供它當做個別的服務，表示為 MaskedTextProvider 類別，定義的文件中所討論的遮罩語言的語法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Many of the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class refer their implementation to similarly named members of the associated MaskedTextProvider.
trans-unit.target: 許多成員的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別參考類似的具名成員相關聯的 MaskedTextProvider 其實作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class refers all access to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> of the MaskedTextProvider class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別會參考的所有存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>的 MaskedTextProvider 類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The mask-parsing engine used by MaskedTextProvider is modeled after the Masked Edit control included in Microsoft Visual Basic version 6.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩編輯控制項隨附於 Microsoft Visual Basic 版本 6 之後，使用 MaskedTextProvider 遮罩剖析引擎會模型化。

trans-unit.source: Its masking language is described in the documentation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它的遮罩語言所述的文件<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following three distinct strings are involved with the MaskedTextProvider class.
trans-unit.target: 下列三個不同字串所涉及的 MaskedTextProvider 類別。

trans-unit.source: |String name|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |Input character or string|Represents the characters used as input that the mask is applied against.
trans-unit.target: |字串名稱 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |輸入字元或字串 |代表做為輸入遮罩是套用針對所使用的字元。

trans-unit.source: In actuality, the input string may be composed of multiple input operations, including <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 事實上，輸入的字串可能由多個輸入的作業，包括<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the input string cannot be accessed directly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，無法直接存取的輸入的字串。

trans-unit.source: However, aspects of the input string handling are available though the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnPrompt%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A> properties.| |Mask|Represents the input formatting mask used to transform the input string into the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 不過，輸入的字串處理層面可透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnPrompt%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A>屬性。 | |遮罩 |代表格式化遮罩，用來將輸入的字串轉換為格式化的字串輸入。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnPrompt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: This string is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> and accessed primarily though the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串中設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>，不過主要存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Characteristics of the mask are also available through other members, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> properties.| |Formatted string|Represents the string that results when the full mask is applied to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩的特性也會提供其他成員，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>，透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>屬性。 | |格式化字串 |表示字串完全遮罩套用至輸入字串時，所造成。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatted string can be queried with many members of the class, including <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskFull%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindEditPositionFrom%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的字串可以查詢具有許多成員的類別，包括<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskFull%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindEditPositionFrom%2A>，依此類推。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindEditPositionFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskFull%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full value of the formatted string is available from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> methods.| > [!NOTE] > The input string may represent direct user input, as in the case of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>, or may be generated by other processes not directly associated with user input/output operations.
trans-unit.target: 完整格式化字串的值是可從<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法。 | > [!NOTE] > 輸入的字串可能代表直接使用者輸入，例如狀況<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>，或可能不是直接使用者輸入/輸出作業相關聯的其他程序所產生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式相當於下列呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Char%2CSystem.Char%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式︰ `MaskedTextProvider(mask , culture, allowPromptAsInput, '_', passwordChar, false)` </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Char%2CSystem.Char%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref> class using the specified mask, culture, prompt usage value, prompt character, password character, and ASCII restriction value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref>類別使用指定的遮罩、 文化特性、 提示使用量值、 提示字元中，密碼字元和 ASCII 限制值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor represents the most general overloaded form.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式表示的最常見的多載的形式。

trans-unit.source: The `mask` parameter must conform to the masking language defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class, which is detailed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: `mask`參數必須符合<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>類別，其中有詳細說明<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>所定義的遮罩語言

trans-unit.source: Because neutral cultures cannot be queried for culture-specific information, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor will use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A> method to search for the first non-neutral culture to use to determine the proper separator characters.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法查詢特定文化特性資訊的中性文化特性<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A>方法來搜尋第一個非中性文化特性，可用來判斷適當的分隔符號字元。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the input mask.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>代表輸入的遮罩。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that is used to set region-sensitive separator characters.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，用來設定區域區分分隔符號字元。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the prompt character should be allowed as a valid input character.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，指定是否應為有效的輸入字元允許提示字元。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> that will be displayed as a placeholder for user input.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Char>，將會顯示為預留位置，代表使用者輸入。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> that will be displayed for characters entered into a password string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Char>，就會顯示輸入的密碼字串的字元。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to restrict input to ASCII-compatible characters; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the entire Unicode set.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要限制為相容的 ASCII 字元的輸入否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>允許完整的 Unicode。

trans-unit.source: The mask parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩參數是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: -or- The mask contains one or more non-printable characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-遮罩包含一或多個非列印字元。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified input character to the end of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 將格式化字串的結尾指定的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法將`input`位置之後，最後指派表示的字元格式化字串中的第一個可用位置的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會基於下列原因失敗:-輸入的值， `input`，列印出來，或不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.source: - There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: -那里格式化字串中的零可用編輯位置或之後在上一個指定的位置有無可用編輯位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> value to be appended to the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Char>要附加至格式化的字串值。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input character was added successfully; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功; 加入輸入的字元否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the characters in the specified input string to the end of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的輸入字串的字元加入至格式化字串的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法將從字元`input`字串來格式化字串， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>之後開始的第一個可用的位置

trans-unit.source: This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - Any of the characters in the input value, `input`, are not printable, or the input value does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會基於下列原因失敗:-任一字元中輸入的值， `input`，無法列印或輸入的值不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough available edit positions in the formatted string after the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: -沒有足夠的可用編輯位置格式字串中最後一個指定的位置之後。

trans-unit.source: If this method fails, no additions are made and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法失敗，不會加入任何而且方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing character values to be appended to the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>含有所要附加至格式化字串的字元值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功; 加入從輸入字串的所有字元否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示已加入任何字元。

trans-unit.source: The input parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The input parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified input character to the end of the formatted string, and then outputs position and descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的輸入的字元加入至格式化的字串結尾，然後輸出位置和描述性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The Add method attempts to add the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法所要加入`input`位置之後，最後指派表示的字元格式化字串中的第一個可用位置的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will fail if all available positions are before the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: 如果是最後一個指派的位置之前的所有可用的位置，則這個方法會失敗。

trans-unit.source: This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會基於下列原因失敗:-輸入的值， `input`，列印出來，或不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.source: - There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: -那里格式化字串中的零可用編輯位置或之後在上一個指定的位置有無可用編輯位置。

trans-unit.source: This method functions the same as the overridden version taking a single <xref:System.Char> parameter, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%28System.Char%29>, except that it outputs additional information.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法接受單一的覆寫版本相同的函數<xref:System.Char>參數， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%28System.Char%29>，只不過它會輸出的其他資訊。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%28System.Char%29> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> value to be appended to the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Char>要附加至格式化的字串值。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the attempt was made to add the character.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中要在嘗試加入字元的以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Adds the characters in the specified input string to the end of the formatted string, and then outputs position and descriptive information.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法將從字元`input`字串來格式化字串， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>之後開始的第一個可用的位置

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the attempt was made to add the character.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the characters from the input string were added successfully; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that no characters were added.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功; 加入從輸入字串的所有字元否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示已加入任何字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the prompt character should be treated as a valid input character or not.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否提示字元應視為有效的輸入字元與否。

trans-unit.source: The AllowPromptAsInput property's value is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: AllowPromptAsInput 屬性的值會設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even when AllowPromptAsInput is `true`, the prompt character must be valid for the current location in the mask in order to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 即使 AllowPromptAsInput 是`true`，才能被接受，提示字元必須是有效的遮罩中的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can enter <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*> into the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以輸入<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>至控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the mask accepts characters outside of the ASCII character set.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出遮罩是否接受外部 ASCII 字元集的字元。

trans-unit.source: The AsciiOnly property's value is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: AsciiOnly 屬性的值會設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `true`, AsciiOnly restricts user input to the ASCII character set.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，AsciiOnly 會限制為 ASCII 字元集的使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if only ASCII is accepted; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref> can accept any arbitrary Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果只接受 ASCII;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref>可以接受任意的任何 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of editable character positions that have already been successfully assigned an input value.
trans-unit.target: 取得已成功地指定輸入的值的可編輯的字元位置數目。

trans-unit.source: The total number of editable character positions, represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A> property, should equal the sum of the AssignedEditPositionCount and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯的字元位置，由總數<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>屬性應該會等於 AssignedEditPositionCount 總和和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of editable character positions in the input mask that have already been assigned a character value in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含的輸入遮罩中已經指定格式化字串中的字元值的可編輯的字元位置數目。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of editable character positions in the input mask that have not yet been assigned an input value.
trans-unit.target: 取得輸入遮罩中尚未指派的輸入的值的可編輯的字元位置數目。

trans-unit.source: The total number of editable character positions, represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A> property, should equal the sum of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A> and the AvailableEditPositionCount properties.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯的字元位置，由總數<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>屬性應該會等於總和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A>和 AvailableEditPositionCount 屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of editable character positions that not yet been assigned a character value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含可編輯的字元數，將尚未指派的字元值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Clears all the editable input characters from the formatted string, replacing them with prompt characters.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有可編輯的輸入的字元從格式化的字串，取代提示字元。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method reinitializes the formatted string, inserting the prompt character into all editable positions.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法重新初始化格式化的字串，並提示字元插入所有可編輯的位置。

trans-unit.source: Clears all the editable input characters from the formatted string, replacing them with prompt characters, and then outputs descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 清除從格式化的字串，取代提示字元中，所有可編輯輸入的字元，然後輸出的描述性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method reinitializes the formatted string, inserting the prompt character into all editable positions.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法重新初始化格式化的字串，並提示字元插入所有可編輯的位置。

trans-unit.source: It functions equivalently to the overridden version that takes no parameters, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear>, except it outputs additional information.
trans-unit.target: 它的函式對等程式碼不採用任何參數的覆寫版本<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear>，只不過它會輸出的其他資訊。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>簡潔描述作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立一份目前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Clone method returns a new copy of the current <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Clone 方法會傳回目前<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>的新複本

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref> object this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"> </xref>這個方法所建立的物件轉換為物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture that determines the value of the localizable separators and placeholders in the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得文化特性會決定可當地語系化的分隔符號和輸入遮罩中的預留位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The Culture property is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性屬性設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> containing the culture information associated with the input mask.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>包含輸入遮罩相關聯的文化特性資訊。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default password character used obscure user input.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設密碼字元使用遮蔽使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultPasswordChar property is defined in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class to be the asterisk character (*).
trans-unit.target: DefaultPasswordChar 屬性已定義於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>類別需要星號字元 （*）。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> that represents the default password character.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Char>表示預設密碼字元。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得格式化的字串中可編輯的位置數目。

trans-unit.source: The total number of editable character positions, represented by the EditPositionCount property, must equal the sum of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯的字元位置，由 EditPositionCount 屬性，總數必須等於總和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value includes both the required and the optional editable characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會包含必要與選擇性可編輯的字元。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含的格式化字串中可編輯的位置數目。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets a newly created enumerator for the editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得新建立的列舉值的格式化字串中可編輯的位置。

trans-unit.source: On every access of the EditPositions property, a temporary collection of editable positions is created that the retrieved <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> operates on.
trans-unit.target: 在 EditPositions 屬性的每個存取，可以讓您編輯位置的暫存集合會建立擷取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>上運作。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that supports enumeration over the editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>格式化字串中可編輯的位置上支援的列舉。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the first assigned editable position after the specified position using the specified search direction.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定可編輯的位置，使用指定的搜尋方向的指定位置之後的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The formatted string is composed of editable characters and literals copied from the mask.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的字串由可編輯的字元所組成，並從複製的常值的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The editable character positions will either be occupied by the prompt character copied from the mask if they are unassigned, or with a valid input character if they have been assigned an input.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯的字元位置可能會佔用複製從遮罩，如果未指定，或有效的輸入字元，如果已指定輸入提示字元。

trans-unit.source: The FindAssignedEditPositionFrom method is used to search for the first assigned character after a specified position and search direction.
trans-unit.target: FindAssignedEditPositionFrom 方法用來搜尋指定的位置和搜尋方向之後第一個指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: The result can subsequently be passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A> indexer to obtain the assigned value at this position.
trans-unit.target: 結果可以接著傳遞為參數，以<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>索引子以取得指派的值，此位置。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionFrom%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionFrom%2A> methods are complements of this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionFrom%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionFrom%2A>方法都是這個方法的補充。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始搜尋的格式化字串中以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating the search direction; either <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search forward or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to search backward.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>表示搜尋方向; 可能是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>向前搜尋或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示向後搜尋。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If successful, an <xref:System.Int32> representing the zero-based position of the first assigned editable position encountered; otherwise <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，<xref:System.Int32>表示以零為起始位置的第一個指派的可編輯的位置發生; 否則為<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the first assigned editable position between the specified positions using the specified search direction.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定可編輯的位置之間使用指定的搜尋方向的指定位置的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The formatted string is composed of editable characters and literals copied from the mask.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的字串由可編輯的字元所組成，並從複製的常值的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The editable character positions will either be occupied by the prompt character copied from the mask if they are unassigned, or with a valid input character if they have been assigned an input.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯的字元位置可能會佔用複製從遮罩，如果未指定，或有效的輸入字元，如果已指定輸入提示字元。

trans-unit.source: The FindAssignedEditPositionInRange method is used to search for the first assigned character between two specified positions, inclusive, using the specified search direction.
trans-unit.target: FindAssignedEditPositionInRange 方法用來搜尋指定的第一個字元，之間兩個指定的位置，內含使用指定的搜尋方向。

trans-unit.source: The result can subsequently be passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A> indexer to obtain the assigned value at this position.
trans-unit.target: 結果可以接著傳遞為參數，以<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>索引子以取得指派的值，此位置。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionInRange%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionInRange%2A> methods are complements of this method.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> denotes success or failure.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref>表示成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following methods of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class contain a parameter of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint> that is used to output information about the operation of the method: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyChar%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>類別包含類型的參數<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint>用於輸出的方法作業的相關資訊︰ <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyChar%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: The GetOperationResultFromHint method interprets this value and returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint> has signaled that the operation was a success or failure.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會解譯 GetOperationResultFromHint 方法，並傳回布林值，指出是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint>發出作業是成功或失敗。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> value typically obtained as an output parameter from a previous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>通常為 output 參數從先前的作業取得的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> value represents a success; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it represents failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref>值代表成功，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果它代表失敗。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether literal characters in the input mask should be included in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該格式化字串中包含輸入遮罩中的常值字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and IncludeLiterals properties will determine whether prompt and literal characters appear when calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>和 IncludeLiterals 屬性會決定呼叫時，是否顯示提示和常值字元<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: By setting both of these properties to `false`, the parsed string will represent only the characters entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定這兩個屬性到`false`，剖析的字串將代表只有使用者所輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if literals are included; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果常值會包含在內。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*> is used to represent the absence of user input when displaying the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>用來代表使用者輸入時顯示格式化的字串不存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: The IncludePrompt and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties will determine whether prompt and literal characters appear when calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: IncludePrompt 和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性會判斷提示和常值字元出現時呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: By setting both of these properties to `false`, the parsed string will represent only the characters entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定這兩個屬性到`false`，剖析的字串將代表只有使用者所輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the prompt character is used to represent the positions where no user input was provided; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果提示字元來表示的位置，其中提供無使用者輸入。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified character at the specified position within the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化字串中指定位置插入指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: The InsertAt method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter.
trans-unit.target: InsertAt 方法插入的第一個編輯位置或超出指定的字元`pos`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將會轉換現有的所有字元之後的插入點移動一個位置，以騰出供插入`input`字元。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生下列錯誤之一，不會執行插入，而且方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: -`pos`參數小於零或大於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: 為在格式化的字串或超出指定的位置，找不到可編輯的字元`pos`。

trans-unit.source: - The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: -插入字元`input`，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目不是有效的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: - There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted.
trans-unit.target: -有是右邊的插入點，沒有可用位置，所以無法移動現有的字元。

trans-unit.source: - Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask.
trans-unit.target: -現有字元移位會產生遮罩的違規情形。

trans-unit.source: An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 空白`input`字串，會導致沒有變更的格式化字串，但是會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>插入。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string to insert the character.
trans-unit.target: 若要插入的字元格式化字串中以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the insertion was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果插入成功;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified string at a specified position within the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化字串中指定位置插入指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The InsertAt method inserts each character from the `input` string into the edit positions located at position `pos` and beyond.
trans-unit.target: InsertAt 方法插入每個字元從`input`字串插入編輯位置位於位置`pos`和更新版本。

trans-unit.source: This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position for each inserted character.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將會變更所有現有的字元之後插入點移動一個位置，針對每個插入的字元。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following errors occurs, no insertion is performed, and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生下列錯誤之一，不會執行插入，而且方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: -`pos`參數小於零或大於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Not enough editable characters exist in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`, to insert all of the characters from the `input` string.
trans-unit.target: -沒有足夠的可編輯字元存在或超出指定的位置，格式化字串中`pos`、 要插入的所有字元從`input`字串。

trans-unit.source: - One or more of the insertion characters are not a valid input character because they are not printable or do not match their corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 對一或多個插入的字元不是有效的輸入的字元因為它們均無法列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted.
trans-unit.target: -沒有足夠的可用位置的插入點，右邊，因此無法移動現有的字元。

trans-unit.source: - Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask.
trans-unit.target: -現有字元移位會產生遮罩的違規情形。

trans-unit.source: Note that this shifting occurs during the insertion of each individual character.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，此移位發生在每個個別字元插入期間。

trans-unit.source: An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 空白`input`字串，會導致沒有變更的格式化字串，但是會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>插入。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the upper bound of the range of invalid indexes.

trans-unit.source: The InvalidIndex property is used to represent a result that is not valid for indexing operations, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: InvalidIndex 屬性用來代表結果不是有效的索引作業，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the provider or implement your own, you should use this property to decide if an index is invalid, rather than hard-coding knowledge of invalid values.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用的提供者，或實作您自己時，您應該使用這個屬性決定如果索引是無效的值無效，而不是硬式編碼解。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the largest invalid index, as determined by the provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示最大無效的索引，由提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the lowest valid index is 0, this property will return -1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果小的有效索引為 0，這個屬性會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified position is available for assignment.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否可供指派指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The IsAvailablePosition method returns `true` only if all of the following conditions are true: - The `pos` parameter is within the bounds of the formatted string; that is, its value is greater than or equal to zero and less than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: IsAvailablePosition 方法會傳回`true`只有當所有下列條件成立:-`pos`參數的格式化字串的範圍內; 亦即，其值是大於或等於零且小於比<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The specified position is an editable character.
trans-unit.target: -指定的位置是可編輯的字元。

trans-unit.source: - A character has not already been assigned to this position.
trans-unit.target: -字元不已指派至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the mask to test.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試之遮罩中以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果格式化的字串中指定的位置是可編輯的且尚未指派給 尚未;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified position is editable.

trans-unit.source: The IsEditPosition method returns `true` only if both of the following conditions are true: - The `pos` parameter is within the bounds of the formatted string; that is, its value is greater than or equal to zero and less than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: IsEditPosition 方法會傳回`true`只有當兩個下列條件成立:-`pos`參數的格式化字串的範圍內; 亦即，其值是大於或等於零且小於比<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether password protection should be applied to the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定密碼保護是否應該套用至格式化的字串。

trans-unit.source: Password protection can be initiated using one of the following two ways: - Setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property to a non-`null` value.
trans-unit.target: 密碼保護可以使用下列其中兩種方式起始:-設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性設為非`null`值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Setting the IsPassword property to `true`., which also sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.DefaultPasswordChar%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: -IsPassword 屬性設定為`true`。，它也會設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.DefaultPasswordChar%2A>值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.DefaultPasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: IsPassword is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> methods to determine whether to reveal the actual input characters or obscure them with <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>.
trans-unit.target: IsPassword 會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>與<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法來判斷是否要顯示實際的輸入的字元，或它們與<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>混淆</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input string is to be treated as a password string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果輸入的字串會被視為密碼字串。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified character is a valid input character.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的字元是否為有效的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: Valid input characters include all printable characters, which include letters, digits, punctuation, symbols and the space character.
trans-unit.target: 有效輸入的字元包括所有可列印的字元，包括字母、 數字、 標點符號、 符號和空格字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>要測試值</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified character contains a valid mask value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的字元包含有效的遮罩值。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified character is a valid password character.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的字元是否為有效的密碼字元。

trans-unit.source: Valid password characters include all printable characters and the null character, which is used to disable password functionality.
trans-unit.target: 有效的密碼字元會包含所有可列印字元和 null 字元，用來停用密碼的功能。

trans-unit.source: Printable characters include letters, digits, punctuation, symbols and the space character.
trans-unit.target: 可列印的字元包括字母、 數字、 標點符號、 符號和空格字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>要測試值</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified character contains a valid password value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的字元包含有效的密碼值。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element at the specified position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中指定的位置取得的項目。

trans-unit.source: The Item property is the standard indexer for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Item 屬性是標準的索引子<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the element to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> at the specified position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>格式化字串中指定的位置。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero or greater than or equal to the of the mask.
trans-unit.target: index小於零或大於或等於的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index in the mask of the rightmost input character that has been assigned to the mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得已指派給遮罩的最右邊輸入字元遮罩中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The LastAssignedPosition property represents the farthest edit position in the mask, relative to the origin, that has been assigned an input character.
trans-unit.target: LastAssignedPosition 屬性代表最遠編輯位置中的遮罩，相對於來源，具有該角色的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: For languages read left-to-right (LTR), such as English, this is the rightmost assigned position; for languages read right-to-left (RTL), this would be the leftmost position.
trans-unit.target: 語言讀取左到右 (LTR)，例如英文，這是最右邊指定位置。讀取由右至左 (RTL) 的語言，這會是最左邊的位置。

trans-unit.source: If at least one input character has been assigned to the mask, an <xref:System.Int32> containing the index of rightmost assigned position; otherwise, if no position has been assigned, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少一個輸入字元指定的遮罩，<xref:System.Int32>包含索引的最右邊的指定位置; 否則如果沒有位置已指派<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the mask, absent any mask modifier characters.
trans-unit.target: 取得的遮罩，不存在的任何遮罩長度修飾詞字元。

trans-unit.source: The Length property represents the total number of characters in the mask, including both the literal and editable characters.
trans-unit.target: Length 屬性表示中的遮罩，包括常值，然後編輯字元的字元總數。

trans-unit.source: The number of literal characters can be determined by subtracting the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A> from the Length.
trans-unit.target: 常值字元的數目可以減去的值來判斷<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>長度。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Length also describes the length of the formatted string, including input characters, literals, and prompt characters.
trans-unit.target: 長度也會說明格式化的字串，包含輸入的字元、 常值和提示字元的長度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of positions in the mask, excluding characters that modify mask input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含遮罩，但不包括修改遮罩輸入的字元位置數目。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得輸入的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The Mask property is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩屬性設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This mask must contain only valid characters as defined by the masking language.
trans-unit.target: 此遮罩必須只包含有效字元遮罩語言所定義。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the full mask.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含完整遮罩。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required inputs have been entered into the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所有必要的輸入是否已經輸入到格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: The MaskCompleted property checks only required input elements.
trans-unit.target: MaskCompleted 屬性會檢查必要的輸入的元素。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all required and optional input elements have been entered, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否已經輸入所有必要和選擇性的輸入項目，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property determines which formatting elements are considered required and which are optional.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>屬性會決定哪一個格式項目會被視為必要的、 哪些是選擇性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all required input has been entered into the mask; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所有必要的輸入已輸入遮罩。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required and optional inputs have been entered into the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所有必要和選擇性的輸入是否已經輸入到格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: To verify if only required input elements have been entered, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認如果只需要輸入的輸入項目，請使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property determines which formatting elements are considered required and which are optional.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>屬性會決定哪一個格式項目會被視為必要的、 哪些是選擇性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all required and optional inputs have been entered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已輸入所有必要和選擇性的輸入值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be substituted for the actual input characters.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來取代實際的輸入字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: For sensitive user input, it is common practice to conceal the actual information entered by the user during output operations.
trans-unit.target: 對於機密的使用者輸入，是常見的作法是隱藏的實際輸出作業期間，使用者所輸入的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the PasswordChar property is set to a non-`null` character, output methods such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> will obscure the input characters with the specified password character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 PasswordChar 屬性會設為非`null`字元，例如輸出方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>會遮蔽的輸入的字元，以指定的密碼字元。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `null` will disable password protection functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`null`將會停用密碼保護功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value used as the password character.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>值做為密碼字元。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The password character specified when setting this property is the same as the current prompt character, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的密碼字元等同於目前的提示字元， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: The two are required to be different.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個必須是不同。

trans-unit.source: The character specified when setting this property is not a valid password character, as determined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*> method.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性不是有效的密碼字元，由指定的字元<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to represent the absence of user input for all available edit positions.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來代表使用者輸入的所有可用編輯位置不存在的字元。

trans-unit.source: The PromptChar property represents the prompt character that is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> methods to represent the current state of the formatted input string.
trans-unit.target: PromptChar 屬性表示提示字元，由<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法來表示格式化的輸入字串的目前狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.source: A prompt character is placed in editable positions that have not yet been assigned an input value.
trans-unit.target: 提示字元會放置在可編輯未指派的輸入的值的位置。

trans-unit.source: Some versions of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method also depend on the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 某些版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法也會取決於值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character used to prompt the user for input.
trans-unit.target: 用來提示使用者輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is an underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: 預設為底線 (_)。

trans-unit.source: The prompt character specified when setting this property is the same as the current password character, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>.
trans-unit.target: 提示字元會指定當設定這個屬性等同於目前的密碼字元<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: The two are required to be different.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個必須是不同。

trans-unit.source: The character specified when setting this property is not a valid password character, as determined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*> method.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性不是有效的密碼字元，由指定的字元<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the last assigned character from the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中移除最後一個指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> method has no effect if there are no characters assigned to the mask yet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>方法沒有任何作用，如果沒有遮罩尚未指派的字元。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the last assigned character is removed from the formatted string, the editable mask character is reset for that position, allowing subsequent input.
trans-unit.target: 當移除最後一個指定的字元時格式化字串時，可編輯的遮罩字元會重設為該位置，讓後續的輸入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功移除字元;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the last assigned character from the formatted string, and then outputs the removal position and descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中，移除最後一個指定的字元，然後輸出移除位置和描述性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> method has no effect if there are no characters assigned to the mask yet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>方法沒有任何作用，如果沒有遮罩尚未指派的字元。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the last assigned character is removed from the formatted string, the editable mask character is reset for that position, allowing subsequent input.
trans-unit.target: 當移除最後一個指定的字元時格式化字串時，可編輯的遮罩字元會重設為該位置，讓後續的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the character was actually removed.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中要實際移除字元之以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>簡潔描述作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功移除字元;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the assigned character at the specified position from the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中移除位於指定位置指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> method has no effect if there are no assigned characters at the removal position specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>方法沒有任何作用，如果指定的移除位置沒有指派的字元。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Literal characters are not affected by this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會影響常值字元。

trans-unit.source: When a character is removed, the remaining higher-positioned characters in the mask will shift to the left to fill in the gap created by the removal.
trans-unit.target: 移除字元時，遮罩中的其餘高位字元將向右移，向左填入移除所建立的間隙。

trans-unit.source: Vacated positions are reset for input.
trans-unit.target: 空出的位置會重設為輸入。

trans-unit.source: If movement of the characters is prevented by the mask definition, no removal occurs, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因遮罩的定義，而無法移動一個字元，就會發生任何移除，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method call is exactly equivalent to the following call to the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> version: `RemoveAt(pos, pos);`
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫相當於下列呼叫多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>版本︰ `RemoveAt(pos, pos);` </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the assigned character to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除指定的字元之以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功移除字元;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the assigned characters between the specified positions from the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的字元位置之間的指定格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> method has no effect if there are no assigned characters at the removal positions specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>方法沒有任何作用，如果在指定的移除位置沒有指派的字元。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a character is removed, the remaining higher-positioned characters in the mask will shift to the left to fill in the gap created by the removal.
trans-unit.target: 移除字元時，遮罩中的其餘高位字元將向右移，向左填入移除所建立的間隙。

trans-unit.source: Vacated positions are reset for input.
trans-unit.target: 空出的位置會重設為輸入。

trans-unit.source: If movement of the characters is prevented by the mask definition, no removal occurs, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因遮罩的定義，而無法移動一個字元，就會發生任何移除，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first assigned character to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除指定第一個字元之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last assigned character to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除指定最後一個字元之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功移除字元;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the assigned characters between the specified positions from the formatted string, and then outputs the removal position and descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的字元，格式化字串，指定位置之間，然後輸出移除位置和描述性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> method has no effect if there are no assigned characters at the removal positions specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>方法沒有任何作用，如果在指定的移除位置沒有指派的字元。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a character is removed, the remaining higher-positioned characters in the mask will shift to the left to fill in the gap created by the removal.
trans-unit.target: 移除字元時，遮罩中的其餘高位字元將向右移，向左填入移除所建立的間隙。

trans-unit.source: Vacated positions are reset for input.
trans-unit.target: 空出的位置會重設為輸入。

trans-unit.source: If movement of the characters is prevented by the mask definition, no removal occurs, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因遮罩的定義，而無法移動一個字元，就會發生任何移除，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> provides two additional output parameters to convey more information about the operation of the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>提供兩個其他輸出參數來傳遞方法的作業的詳細資訊。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first assigned character to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除指定第一個字元之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last assigned character to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除指定最後一個字元之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the zero-based position in the formatted string of where the characters were actually removed; otherwise, the first position where the operation failed.

trans-unit.source: Replaces a single character at or beyond the specified position with the specified character value.

trans-unit.source: The Replace method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法中的可編輯的第一個位置，或超出指定的位置，格式化字串中搜尋`pos`。

trans-unit.source: If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一個物件，可編輯的位置的值變更為指定的字元， `input`。

trans-unit.source: Any of the following conditions will result in an error that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 下列任何一個狀況會導致執行取代作業發生錯誤，而值為`false`傳回:-`pos`參數小於零或大於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: 為在格式化的字串或超出指定的位置，找不到可編輯的字元`pos`。

trans-unit.source: - The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: -取代字元， `input`，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目不是有效的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value that replaces the existing value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>會取代現有值的值。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position to search for the first editable character to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的可編輯的第一個字元，取代以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully replaced; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功取代字元。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Replaces a range of editable characters starting at the specified position with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 取代指定的位置以指定字串開始的可編輯字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: The Replace method searches for the first editable position at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法中搜尋第一個可編輯的位置或超出指定的位置， `pos`。

trans-unit.source: Operating under the assumption that there are enough editable positions after this point, the existing character values are replaced one-by-one with the contents of the replacement string parameter, `input`.
trans-unit.target: 在假設在這個點之後有足夠的可編輯位置下操作，現有的字元值會被取代--一個取代字串參數的內容`input`。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions are considered errors.
trans-unit.target: 下列條件會被視為錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When an error occurs, no replacement occurs and Replace returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤時，沒有替代項目，就會發生，則 Replace 會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: -`pos`參數小於零或大於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string.
trans-unit.target: -沒有足夠保存內容的取代字串來格式化字串中可編輯的位置。

trans-unit.source: - One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 的其中一個的取代字元值無效，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>用來取代現有的可編輯字元值。</xref:System.String>
