trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定應該如何處理符合提示字元的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> can treat two categories of characters, paces and prompt characters, in a special manner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>可以在以特殊方式處理字元、 置和提示字元中，兩個類別目錄。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，每個輸入的字元將經過遮罩，然後針對接受或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: Operating on the assumption that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`, then setting the ResetOnPrompt property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 假設，<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>以外屬性設定為值`null`，然後將 ResetOnPrompt 屬性設定為`true`會導致提示字元的特殊處理。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a prompt character is added, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character.
trans-unit.target: 提示字元加入時，它會導致要清除目前的遮罩字元位置和前進至下一個可編輯的字元目前位置。

trans-unit.source: ResetOnPrompt takes precedence over the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> property as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: ResetOnPrompt 會優先於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>下表中所述的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default.| |`true`|`false`|The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|The prompt character is processed as a normal input character.| |`false`|`false`|The prompt character is not valid and methods attempting to add the character will fail.|
trans-unit.target: 預設值。 | |`true`|`false`|可以加入提示字元，而且它會導致重設目前的遮罩位置。 | |`false`|`true`|提示字元當做一般輸入字元。 | |`false`|`false`|無效的提示字元，嘗試要加入之字元的方法將會失敗。 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the prompt character entered as input causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the prompt character is to be processed as a normal input character.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果提示輸入做為輸入的字元導致目前的編輯位置重設; 遮罩中否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示提示字元當做一般輸入字元來處理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how a space input character should be handled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定應該如何處理空格輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> can treat two categories of characters, spaces and prompt characters, in a special manner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>可以以特殊方式處理字元、 空格和提示字元中，兩種類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，每個輸入的字元將經過遮罩，然後針對接受或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: Setting the ResetOnSpace property to `true` will result in the current mask character position being cleared and the current position being advanced to the next editable character.
trans-unit.target: ResetOnSpace 屬性設定為`true`導致目前的遮罩字元位置正在清除與正在前移至下一個可編輯的字元目前位置。

trans-unit.source: ResetOnSpace is useful when assigning text that was saved excluding the prompt, where the prompt is replaced with a space.
trans-unit.target: ResetOnSpace 時，指派文字提示字元中，但不包括已儲存其中提示會取代空格。

trans-unit.source: Before restoring such a string, setting ResetOnSpace to `true` will reset the prompt characters at the positions occupied by spaces in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 還原這類的字串，設定 ResetOnSpace 之前`true`會重設的提示字元，在輸入字串中的空格所佔用的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the space input character causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that it is to be processed as a normal input character.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果空格輸入的字元導致目前的編輯位置遮罩中要重設。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指出它是要當做一般輸入字元來處理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formatted string to the specified input string.
trans-unit.target: 將格式化的字串設定為指定的輸入字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> method clears the existing contents of the formatted string and then applies the mask against the `input` string to update the contents of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>方法清除現有的格式化字串內容，然後再套用針對遮罩`input`来更新的內容格式化字串的字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following conditions are considered errors.
trans-unit.target: 下列條件會被視為錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When an error occurs, the formatted string remains unaltered and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤時，保持不變，格式化的字串和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string.
trans-unit.target: -沒有足夠保存內容的取代字串來格式化字串中可編輯的位置。

trans-unit.source: - One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 的其中一個的取代字元值無效，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value used to set the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>用來設定格式化的字串值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the characters were successfully set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功設定的所有字元。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The input parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The input parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the formatted string to the specified input string, and then outputs the removal position and descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 將格式化的字串設定為指定的輸入字串，然後輸出移除位置和描述性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> method clears the existing contents of the formatted string and then applies the mask against the `input` string to update the contents of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>方法清除現有的格式化字串內容，然後再套用針對遮罩`input`来更新的內容格式化字串的字串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following conditions are considered errors.
trans-unit.target: 下列條件會被視為錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When an error occurs, the formatted string remains unaltered and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤時，保持不變，格式化的字串和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string.
trans-unit.target: -沒有足夠保存內容的取代字串來格式化字串中可編輯的位置。

trans-unit.source: - One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 的其中一個的取代字元值無效，因為它不是可列印或不符合對應的遮罩項目。

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> provides two additional output parameters to convey more information about the operation of the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>提供兩個其他輸出參數來傳遞方法的作業的詳細資訊。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value used to set the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>用來設定格式化的字串值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If successful, the zero-based position in the formatted string where the last character was actually set; otherwise, the first position where the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，其中實際設定的最後一個字元; 的以零為起始位置在格式化的字串否則，第一個定位作業失敗的位置。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the set operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>簡潔描述設定作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the characters were successfully set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功設定的所有字元。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The input parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The input parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether literal character positions in the mask can be overwritten by their same values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否遮罩中的常值字元位置將會覆寫相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Input masks can contain literal and editable characters.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的遮罩可以包含常值，然後可編輯的字元。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to add an input character to the position in a mask occupied by a literal, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SkipLiterals%2A> property determines the result.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試將輸入的字元常值的值所佔用的遮罩中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SkipLiterals%2A>屬性會決定結果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SkipLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If this property is `true`, it is valid to overwrite a literal with the same value when adding input characters.
trans-unit.target: -如果此屬性為`true`，它是有效時，覆寫常值相同的值加入輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, a forward slash character value, `'/'`, could be added to the third position of the mask `"00/00/000"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正斜線字元值， `'/'`，無法新增至遮罩的第三個位置`"00/00/000"`。

trans-unit.source: - If this property is `false`, it is not valid to assign any value to a mask position occupied by a literal character.
trans-unit.target: -如果此屬性為`false`，不是有效的常值字元所佔用的遮罩位置指派任何值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow literals to be added back; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to not allow the user to overwrite literal characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要允許常值加回。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>為不允許使用者覆寫常值字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the formatted string in a displayable form.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可顯示的表單中的格式化的字串。

trans-unit.source: The ToDisplayString method will always include prompt and literal characters in the return value, regardless of the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: ToDisplayString 方法一定會包含在傳回的值，不論值中的提示和常值字元<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will always display password characters if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a character value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會顯示密碼字元，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>以外屬性設定的字元值為`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: ToDisplayString is commonly used to obtain the string to display in associated user interface elements, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: ToDisplayString 通常用來取得相關聯的使用者介面項目，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>中顯示的字串

trans-unit.source: The formatted <xref:System.String> that includes prompts and mask literals.
trans-unit.target: 格式化<xref:System.String>包含遮罩常值和提示。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns the formatted string that includes all the assigned character values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含所有指定的字元值的格式化的字串。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法包含根據目前的值的常值和提示<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: It will always return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它一律會傳回原始輸入的字元，即將忽略值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為這個方法會顯示密碼字元通常保護使用者介面中的資訊，則應謹慎小心避免不慎洩露機密的使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: The formatted <xref:System.String> that includes all the assigned character values.
trans-unit.target: 格式化<xref:System.String>，其中包含所有指定的字元值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns the formatted string, optionally including password characters.
trans-unit.target: 傳回格式化的字串，並選擇性地包含密碼字元。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法包含根據目前的值的常值和提示<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `ignorePasswordChar` parameter is `true`, it will return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ignorePasswordChar`參數是`true`，它會傳回原始輸入的字元，即將忽略值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is `false`, it will use the password character to obscure editable user input if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數是`false`，它會使用的密碼字元遮蔽可編輯的使用者輸入，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>以外屬性設定為值`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method potentially reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為這個方法可能會揭露資訊通常是在使用者介面保護的密碼字元，則應謹慎小心避免不慎洩露機密的使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the actual editable characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*> property is to be honored.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要傳回的實際可編輯的字元。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>屬性是能被接受。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: The formatted <xref:System.String> that includes literals, prompts, and optionally password characters.
trans-unit.target: 格式化<xref:System.String>包含常值、 提示，以及 （選擇性） 密碼字元。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns the formatted string, optionally including prompt and literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 傳回格式化的字串，並選擇性地包含提示和常值字元。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method includes prompts and literals according to the values of the `IncludePrompt` and `IncludeLiterals` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法包含根據的值的常值和提示`IncludePrompt`和`IncludeLiterals`參數，分別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notice that these parameters override the values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A><xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這些參數會覆寫<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will always return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回原始輸入的字元，即將忽略值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為這個方法會顯示密碼字元通常保護使用者介面中的資訊，則應謹慎小心避免不慎洩露機密的使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include prompt characters in the return string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要包含在傳回的字串; 提示字元否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include literal characters in the return string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要傳回的字串; 中包含常值字元否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 格式化<xref:System.String>，包括所有指派的字元值，並選擇性地包含常值和提示。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回格式化字串的子字串。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法會傳回格式化的字串開始位置的子字串`startPos`包括後續的數字所指定的字元和`length`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The returned string includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串包含根據目前的值的常值和提示<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The return string will contain the original input characters; the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串會包含原始輸入的字元。<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性永遠會被忽略。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為這個方法會顯示密碼字元通常保護使用者介面中的資訊，則應謹慎小心避免不慎洩露機密的使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: ToString performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: ToString 輸入參數中有不一致時，請執行下列動作:-如果`startPos`小於零，開始的位置會設定為零。

trans-unit.source: - If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`startPos`大於或等於實際<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字串，<xref:System.String.Empty>就會傳回字串。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`length`大於傳回的剩餘字元過去的開始位置，只剩餘字元數。

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`length`小於或等於零，<xref:System.String.Empty>就會傳回字串。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the output begins.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串中要開始輸出的以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的字元數。

trans-unit.source: If successful, a substring of the formatted <xref:System.String>, which includes all the assigned character values; otherwise the <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功的話，格式化的子字串<xref:System.String>，其中包括所有指派的字元值; 否則為<xref:System.String>字串。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of the formatted string, optionally including password characters.
trans-unit.target: 傳回子字串的格式化字串，並選擇性地包含密碼字元。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法會傳回格式化的字串開始位置的子字串`startPos`包括後續的數字所指定的字元和`length`參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The returned string includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串包含根據目前的值的常值和提示<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `ignorePasswordChar` parameter is `true`, it will return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ignorePasswordChar`參數是`true`，它會傳回原始輸入的字元，即將忽略值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is `false`, it will use the password character to obscure editable user input if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數是`false`，它會使用的密碼字元遮蔽可編輯的使用者輸入，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>以外屬性設定為值`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method potentially reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為這個方法可能會揭露資訊通常是在使用者介面保護的密碼字元，則應謹慎小心避免不慎洩露機密的使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: - If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified character could be set successfully at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否可以成功設定指定的字元，在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The VerifyChar method tests whether a single character value represents valid input at the specified position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: VerifyChar 方法測試是否單一字元值代表有效的輸入，格式化字串中指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method will return `false` for the following reasons: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`false`，原因如下:-`pos`參數小於零或大於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The character `input` is not a valid input character, as determined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidInputChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -字元`input`不是有效的輸入的字元，由<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidInputChar%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The `input` is not compatible with the mask element at the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: -`input`遮罩處的項目指定的位置，與不相容`pos`。

trans-unit.source: The last condition may depend on the current value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個條件可能會取決於目前的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>，<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: To test an entire input string against the mask, use one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試遮罩針對整個輸入的字串，使用其中一種<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>方法而。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>要測試值</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The position in the mask to test the input character against.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試輸入的字元的遮罩中的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>簡潔描述作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified character is valid for the specified position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的字元是適用於指定的位置。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified character would be escaped at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否指定的字元會逸出指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: A character is said to be *escaped* if it is valid input, but is not assigned to that position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 字元稱為*逸出*如果它是有效的輸入，但未指派至格式化的字串中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Escaped characters fall into the following three categories: - Prompt characters are escaped if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 逸出的字元可分為下列三個類別:-提示字元會逸出，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Input characters are escaped if they have the same value as the literal in the mask, and if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -輸入字元的逸出，如果遮罩中相同的值與常值，且如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Space characters are escaped if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 空格字元會逸出，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A>

trans-unit.source: The VerifyEscapeChar method will also return `false` if the `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>.
trans-unit.target: VerifyEscapeChar 方法也會傳回`false`如果`pos`參數小於零或大於<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>要測試值</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The position in the mask to test the input character against.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試輸入的字元的遮罩中的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified character would be escaped at the specified position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的字元會逸出指定的位置。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified string could be set successfully.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否可以成功設定指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> applies the `input` string against the mask, without actually changing the formatted string, to test whether `input` would be valid in a corresponding <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>適用於`input`字串和遮罩，而不會實際變更要測試的格式化的字串是否`input`是有效的對應<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>作業。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `true` if input is `null` or has zero length.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會傳回`true`如果輸入是`null`或長度為零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要測試值</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified string represents valid input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的字串代表有效的輸入。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified string could be set successfully, and then outputs position and descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否可以成功，設定指定的字串然後輸出位置和描述性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> applies the `input` string against the mask, without actually changing the formatted string, to test whether `input` would be valid in a corresponding <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>適用於`input`字串和遮罩，而不會實際變更要測試的格式化的字串是否`input`是有效的對應<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>作業。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `true` if input is `null` or has zero length.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會傳回`true`如果輸入是`null`或長度為零。

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> provides two additional output parameters to convey more information about the operation of the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>提供兩個其他輸出參數來傳遞方法的作業的詳細資訊。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要測試值</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If successful, the zero-based position of the last character actually tested; otherwise, the first position where the test failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功的話，實際測試的最後一個字元的以零為起始的位置;否則，第一個位置測試失敗的位置。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the test operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>簡潔描述測試作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified string represents valid input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的字串代表有效的輸入。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
